s.text: 2). Yes, running for public office while serving as first lady does trouble me in ways that go beyond legalistic questions of whether White House funds are used for her travel and campaign expenses.
I realize that yesterday in my haste to wrap up our correspondence in a timely fashion, I never got a chance to explain why Hillary's Senate race makes me so uncomfortable.
I realize that yesterday in my haste to wrap up our correspondence in a timely fashion, I never got a chance to explain why Hillary's Senate race makes me so uncomfortable.
